name: Oprichniki Bombardier

investigation.name: Fatui Oprichnik
investigation.description: A soldier encased within a Fatui war machine.\nUnlike their Skirmisher cousins, soldiers of the Oprichniki are formally recruited and rigorously trained. They are deployed either to the Fatui's most critical strongholds or thrown into the deadliest frontline battles.

description: A soldier of the Fatui Oprichniki, equipped with a specialized hover pack and explosive charges, and tasked with performing breaching operations.\nAs troops with immense breakthrough potential, bombardiers are often sent to the most dire of battlefields, making them the troops who gain meritorious promotions most quickly. It is said that Oprichniki officers overwhelmingly come from the ranks of the bombardiers.
